page.title: 11Social Concerns,Wishford.
page.content: People are worried about the younger people moving away from the village to towns to get jobs.Also they are concerned about the lack of facilities for the young children,only some swings and they are near the main road. Villagers do not like the A36 road through the valley, because it was not designed for big lorries and heavy traffic, and it is a very dangerous road to cross. People are concerned about the new by-pass they are worried about it spoiling the countryside though they do admit a new road is necessary. Another worry is that small village schools will close down in the future.
